body.p: The Waveforms page () corresponds to the Plots screen (). Click the Get button to click through the waveforms associated with events. Waveforms are time-and-date stamped to let you associate them with specific events in the Alarms or Log web pages. Up to 25 events with waveforms or plots are stored.
Multiple web sessions can be in progress simultaneously. You can view a Log page in one session while viewing Waveforms in another.
